interactions.description: This workflow validates a wallet address, processes a claim via different API endpoints based on claim type, manages loading and error states, and handles both success and error responses properly.

mobile.animationKeyframes: @keyframes slideUpFromBottom { from { transform: translateY(100%); } to { transform: translateY(0%); } }

tablet.animationKeyframes: @keyframes fadeIn { from { opacity: 0; transform: translate(-50%, -50%) scale(0.95); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translate(-50%, -50%) scale(1); } }

default.animationKeyframes: @keyframes fadeIn { from { opacity: 0; transform: translate(-50%, -50%) scale(0.95); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translate(-50%, -50%) scale(1); } }
